input_args.**: {'stringify_request': '{"temperature": 0.7, "max_tokens": 300, "top_p": 1, "frequency_penalty": 0, "presence_penalty": 0, "n": 20, "model": "gpt-4", "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "Answer questions with short factoid answers.\\n\\n---\\n\\nFollow the following format.\\n\\nContext:\\n${sources that may contain relevant content}\\n\\nQuestion: ${the question to be answered}\\n\\nRationale: Let\'s think step by step. ${a step-by-step deduction that identifies the correct response, which will be provided below}\\n\\nAnswer: ${a short factoid answer, often between 1 and 5 words}\\n\\n---\\n\\nContext:\\n[1] \\u00abReturn Policy | Having second thoughts about your gear? No hard feelings - you can make a return online or in store within 30 days of the delivery date.\\u00bb\\n[2] \\u00abReturns | lululemon athletica | Whether you\'re making a return online or in-store, find out what our return policy is and how you can make a return.\\u00bb\\n\\nQuestion: Could you briefly talk about https://shop.lululemon.com/help/returns\\n\\nRationale: Let\'s think step by step."}]}'}
